doc.title: Contemplating Annie
doc.plot: How do you communicate with someone who is your last remaining relative, but doesn't speak your language? Annie is about to find out when she opens her door one morning to find the grandmother she's never met standing on her doorstep. In this simple story about a granddaughter and grandmother helping each other to cope with the death of their loved one, Contemplating Annie explores the complicated conceptions of family, identity and life's choices through the simplicity of universal love and unconditional acceptance.
